byline: Dan Bobkoff, Leoneda Inge and David Brancaccio
description: President Obama meets with the leaders of El Salvador, Guatemala and Honduras today at the White House to talk about the child migrant crisis. We’ll look at what options US and Central American leaders have to try to fix it.
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday July 25, 2014
teaser: President Obama meets with the leaders of El Salvador, Guatemala and Honduras today at the White House to talk about the child migrant crisis. We’ll look at what options US and Central American leaders have to try to fix it.
